field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will activate the Tailscale service.

field.label: Listen Port
field.help: UDP port to listen on for WireGuard and peer-to-peer traffic.

field.label: Accept DNS
field.help: Accept DNS configuration from the control server.

field.label: Advertise Exit Node
field.help: Offer to be an exit node for outbound internet traffic from the Tailscale network.

field.label: Accept Subnet Routes
field.help: Accept subnet routes that other nodes advertise.

field.label: Login timeout
field.help: Maximum time to wait for successful login, in seconds. Set to 0 to wait indefinitely, however this may prevent OPNsense booting completely if the Tailscale control plane is unavailable. Default is 10 seconds.
